Question: In 2010, President Barack Obama honoured this person with the Gershwin Prize for his contributions to popular music.
Hints: Ringo appeared in the video for this person's 1983 song So Bad (from the Pipes of Peace album).
This person's loss later became a point of connection with John Lennon, whose mother, Julia, had died when he was seventeen.
In 1981, this person sang backup on Harrison's tribute to their ex-bandmate, "All Those Years Ago", which featured Starr on drums.
